title: Job Openings at Keystone Bank
content:
Keystone Bank is a full service commercial bank currently owned by Sigma Golf River Bank Consortium after being acquired from the Asset Management Corporation of Nigeria (AMCON) in 2017. It was granted banking license on August 5, 2011, by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN). The Bank has met and exceeded all capital adequacy requirements of the CBN and assumed the deposit liabilities, certain other liabilities and assets of former Bank PHB Plc, following the revocation of the erstwhile bank's operating License by the CBN.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Technical Assistant to the Executive Director, Enterprise Risk Management
     

            
    



Job Location: Lagos

Job Description


	This role requires a highly organised and detail-oriented professional to provide comprehensive technical support to the Executive Director, Risk Management.
	The ideal candidate should possess a solid understanding of risk management principles and regulatory frameworks.
	They will be proficient in coordinating risk management activities, preparing accurate reports and presentations, and facilitating effective communication across departments.
	The candidate must demonstrate excellent interpersonal and organisational skills, discretion in handling confidential information, and the ability to manage multiple priorities within a dynamic banking environment. Proficiency in Microsoft Office and other related work tools is essential.


Click here to apply online

 

2) Chief Risk Officer

Job Location: Lagos

Job Description


	This role requires a strategic leader with deep expertise in Enterprise Risk Management within the Nigerian banking sector, strong regulatory engagement experience, and the ability to drive a robust risk culture across the organisation. 
	The successful candidate will be responsible for shaping and executing the Bank’s enterprise-wide risk strategy, ensuring adherence to regulatory frameworks, guiding the identification and mitigation of emerging risks, providing timely and insightful reports to the Executive Management, and embedding risk awareness into business decision-making processes. 
	They will also oversee credit, market, operational, liquidity, and compliance risk functions, while fostering strong relationships with regulators, auditors, and other stakeholders to safeguard the Bank’s stability and reputation.


Click here to apply online

title: Job Openings at Buckle Messenger
content:
Buckle Messenger is a logistics solution provider, providing both technical logistical solutions like app and website integration and logistic services.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Analytical Chemist / Chemical Engineer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	To work with the MD in analysing and developing processes for safe consumer products.
	Must be familiar with national and international regulations as regards components in use.
	Must be able to demonstrate experience theoretically and practically.
	Must be familiar with QC processes.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree / MSc qualification with 3 - 8 years of work experience.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and relevant qualifications to: sendbuckle@gmail.com using the Job Posiand Date as the subject of the mail

Note


	Emails without a proper introduction letter will be ignored.
	Accommodation may be provided if necessary.


 

 

2.) Fumigation Operator

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are in need of an operator to handle fumigation, cleaning and painting.
	Must be comfortable working with pesticides and cleaning chemicals.
	Must be able to work weekends.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND / NCE / OND / SSCE certificate with 2 - 5 years of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send an email with an introduction letter and CV to: sendbuckle@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note


	Emails without a proper introduction will be ignored
	Shared accommodation available with opening.


 

 

3.) Civil Engineer / Site Supervisor

Job Location: Lekki,Lagos

Responsibilities


	Manage workers, workflow and delivery on sites.
	Report to the MD.


Requirements


	Must have practical experience with renovation, error detection and remediation and general aesthetics.
	Must be hands on.


Salary
N120,000 - N130,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send an introduction letter and a copy of CV to: sendbuckle@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	Emails without a proper introduction letter will be ignored.
	Accommodation is available on the property.
	Just bring your own furniture.
